thread.title: Christian Nationalists on Trump's Jewish Children
thread.title_full: Christian Nationalists on Trump's Jewish Children

title: Christian Nationalists on Trump's Jewish Children
text: MAGA reacts to Michael Flynn's recent quote, "if the nation is one nation under god, then it should be one nation under one god," and how that would impact Trump and his kids. Michael Shure reports for TYT from the GOTV Rally for Donald Trump in Richmond, VA.
